summary: This is a brief email forwarding a signed court bundle document titled 'SDNY Triggerfish Court Bundle copy' from Andrea Johnstone to Kathleen DuPont and Brier Temple. The email includes the original message and attachments.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a signed court bundle titled 'SDNY Triggerfish Court Bundle copy'.
The email was sent on July 1, 2020, from Andrea Johnstone to Kathleen DuPont and Brier Temple.
The attachment suggests legal proceedings or filings related to the SDNY (Southern District of New York) and possibly electronic surveillance (Triggerfish).
